div.bibl: Record Books of Limanas Daukantas Federal Savings and Loan Association of Chicago, 2202 W. Cermak Road, in possession of Secretary, Limanas Daukatas Federal Savings and Loan Association [SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION]

body.p: This Savings and Loan Association was organized in 1905. The first organizers were: A. Kurelis, Makaveckas, M. Dada, Radomskis, M. Maldazis, J. Urbikas and others.
The financial statement for December 21, 1936, shows that the assets were $528,419.09.

Administration: John J. Kazanauskas, president; John Zilis, vice-president; Ben J. Kazanauskas, secretary-treasurer; Joseph Misevich, assistant secretary-treasurer; Miss Irene Kuchinskas, attorney Wm. Duoba, Joseph W. Kilikevice, Peter Kraujelis, Anthony Vilkas, Michael Kelly, Joseph P. Varkala, auditors.
